faqs.question: How does the book creation process work?
faqs.answer:
Creating your personalized children's book is simple and takes just a few minutes:

  1. Choose Your Story: Browse our collection of story themes and select one that fits your child's interests and age.
  2. Upload a Photo: Upload a clear, well-lit photo of your child. We use this to create a consistent character throughout the book.
  3. Customize Details: Add your child's name, select preferences, and personalize the dedication page.
  4. Preview & Edit: Review the generated book and make any changes to text.
  5. Order: Choose between digital PDF or printed hardcover book delivery.

The entire process typically takes 5-10 minutes, and you'll see a preview before finalizing your order.

faqs.question: How do I upload photos and what quality is needed?
faqs.answer:
To get the best character results, follow these photo guidelines:

Photo Requirements:

  • Resolution: Minimum 1024x1024 pixels (higher is better)
  • Format: JPG or PNG files
  • Face Visibility: Child's face should be clearly visible and facing forward
  • Lighting: Well-lit photos with natural lighting work best
  • Background: Simple, uncluttered backgrounds help the AI focus on the face
  • Single Subject: One child per photo (no group photos)

Tips for Best Results:

  • Use recent photos taken in good lighting
  • Avoid blurry, dark, or heavily filtered images
  • Photos taken outdoors in natural light often work best
  • Make sure the child's eyes are open and face is not obscured

Photo Rights & Consent:

  • You must have rights to use the uploaded photos
  • Obtain consent from persons depicted in photos
  • For minors: parental/guardian consent required
  • Do not upload photos of famous characters or copyrighted content

You can upload multiple photos and choose the one that generates the best character representation.

faqs.question: Can I customize the story, text, and illustrations?
faqs.answer:
Yes! We offer customization options:

Text Customization:

  • Edit any text in the story to personalize it further
  • Modify character names and details
  • Add or change the dedication message
  • Adjust story elements to fit your child's preferences

Character Customization:

  • Child's name appears throughout the story
  • Character generated based on uploaded photo
  • Consistent character appearance across all pages

Important Note:

Once illustrations are generated, they cannot be changed. Please review carefully during the preview stage before placing your order. All customization happens in the preview stage, so you can perfect the book exactly how you want it.

faqs.question: What languages do you support?
faqs.answer:
We currently support the following languages for both the website interface and book content:

Fully Supported Languages:

  • English: Complete support for all features
  • Hebrew: Full RTL (Right-to-Left) layout support
  • German: Complete translation and localization

Book Content:

You can create books in any of the supported languages. The AI generates age-appropriate, grammatically correct content in your selected language.

Website Interface:

The entire website, including navigation, checkout, and help content, is available in all supported languages. Simply use the language switcher in the navigation menu.

Coming Soon:

We're working on adding Spanish, French, and Arabic support. Sign up for our newsletter to be notified when new languages become available.

faqs.question: What if I'm not satisfied with the results?
faqs.answer:
We're committed to your satisfaction, and we provide several safeguards:

Preview Before Ordering:

Before completing your order, you can review and edit:

  • The first page illustration (cover image)
  • The complete story text
  • All personalization details

Important: The remaining illustrations are generated after you complete your digital purchase. This is when the magic happens!

What You Can Edit:

  • Text Only: You can edit any text in the story to personalize it further
  • Modify character names and details
  • Adjust story elements to fit your child's preferences
  • Change the dedication message

What You Cannot Edit:

  • Illustrations cannot be changed once generated
  • Character appearance is based on your uploaded photo
  • Art style is determined by the story theme you selected

Quality Disclaimer:

Our story creation technology produces unique, personalized books, but results may vary based on photo quality and complexity. Minor artistic variations are normal and part of the creative interpretation. Generated content is provided 'as is' without guarantees of perfection.

What Qualifies as a Defect:

  • Printing errors or physical damage
  • Missing pages or incorrect binding
  • Significant deviation from approved preview
  • Books damaged during shipping

What's NOT Considered a Defect:

  • Minor artistic variations in generated illustrations
  • Slight color differences from digital preview (normal in printing)
  • Personal preference differences in art style
  • Creative interpretation of facial features

If you receive a defective book, we offer a full refund or replacement within 14 days of delivery.

faqs.question: What happens to my child's photo? How is it protected?
faqs.answer:
We take your privacy and your child's safety very seriously:

Photo Usage:

  • Photos are used only to generate character illustrations for your book
  • NOT used to train AI models
  • NOT shared with third parties (except our secure AI service provider)
  • NOT used for marketing or any other purpose

Automatic Deletion:

  • Photos are automatically deleted after 7 days of order completion
  • This is much shorter than industry standards (typically 30-90 days)
  • Deletion is permanent and cannot be reversed

Security Measures:

  • All photos encrypted during upload and storage (SSL/TLS)
  • Stored on secure, access-controlled servers
  • Only authorized systems can access photos for processing
  • Full compliance with GDPR, CCPA, and children's privacy laws

Your Rights:

  • Request immediate deletion at any time by contacting support
  • Access a copy of your data
  • Request information about how your data is processed

For complete details, please review our Privacy Policy.

faqs.question: Can I order a digital version or only physical books?
faqs.answer:
We offer both digital and physical book options:

Digital PDF Book:

  • Price: Available as part of your order
  • Delivery: Instant download after order completion
  • Format: High-resolution PDF optimized for screen viewing
  • Use: View on tablets, computers, or e-readers
  • Sharing: Personal use only (not for commercial distribution)

Physical Hardcover Book:

  • Format: Premium hardcover with glossy pages
  • Size: 8.5" x 11" (standard children's book size)
  • Pages: 24-32 pages depending on story
  • Quality: Professional printing with vibrant colors
  • Delivery: Ships within 5-7 business days

Bundle Option:

Order both digital and physical together for the best value. The digital version is perfect for immediate enjoyment while waiting for the printed book to arrive.

faqs.question: What are your pricing options and discounts?
faqs.answer:
We offer transparent, straightforward pricing with no hidden fees:

Single Book Pricing:

  • Digital PDF: $15 - Instant download after order
  • Physical Hardcover: $45 - Includes digital copy, professional printing, and shipping

Payment Methods:

We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express, Discover), PayPal, and Apple Pay.

Currency & Pricing:

All prices are displayed in your local currency based on your location. No currency conversion fees. Visit our pricing page to see exact prices in your currency.

faqs.question: What is your shipping and delivery policy?
faqs.answer:
We provide reliable shipping with clear timelines:

Production Time:

  • AI Generation: Instant (during creation process)
  • Book Printing: 3-5 business days after order
  • Quality Check: 1 business day
  • Total Production: 4-6 business days

Shipping Options:

  • Standard Shipping: 5-7 business days (Free on qualifying orders)
  • Expedited Shipping: 2-3 business days (additional fee)
  • Express Shipping: 1-2 business days (additional fee)

International Shipping:

  • Europe: 7-14 business days
  • Other Regions: 10-21 business days
  • Customs: Customer responsible for any import duties/taxes

Order Tracking:

You'll receive a tracking number via email once your book ships. Track your order in real-time through our website or the carrier's website.

Delivery Issues:

If your book doesn't arrive within the expected timeframe, contact our support team and we'll investigate immediately.

faqs.question: What is your cancellation and refund policy?
faqs.answer:
We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase. Here's our cancellation policy:

Cancellation Window:

  • Before Production: Full refund if cancelled within 48 hours of order placement and before printing begins
  • During Production: Cannot cancel once book enters printing (typically 48 hours after order)
  • After Shipping: Cannot cancel, but return policy applies for defective books

How to Cancel:

  1. Email support@kidbookcreator.com with your order number
  2. We'll confirm if your order is eligible for cancellation
  3. Refund processed within 5-7 business days to original payment method

Personalized Product Notice:

As personalized products are made specifically for you, they cannot be cancelled once production begins. This is standard industry practice and complies with consumer protection laws:

  • EU: Consumer Rights Directive Article 16(c) - Personalized goods excluded from right of withdrawal
  • UK: Consumer Contracts Regulations 2013
  • US: State-specific consumer protection laws

Digital E-Books:

  • Cannot be cancelled once generation starts
  • Not eligible for refund after download
  • Preview carefully before finalizing order

Exceptions:

  • Defective or damaged books can be returned for full refund (see Return Policy)
  • Significant production errors qualify for refund or replacement
  • Force majeure events (delivery failures beyond our control)

Our Commitment:

We offer a longer 48-hour cancellation window compared to the industry standard 24 hours. We'll always work with you to find a fair solution if issues arise.

faqs.question: What is your return policy for defective books?
faqs.answer:
We stand behind the quality of our books and offer a comprehensive return policy for defective products:

Return Eligibility:

  • Timeframe: Report defects within 14 days of delivery
  • Condition: Book must be in original condition (unread or gently read)
  • Proof Required: Clear photos of the defect must be provided
  • Inspection: Inspect your book immediately upon delivery

What Qualifies as Defective:

  • Printing errors: Blurry images, color issues, text errors
  • Physical damage: Torn pages, broken binding, damaged cover
  • Missing pages or incorrect page order
  • Significant deviation from approved preview
  • Shipping damage: Books damaged during transit
  • Production errors: Wrong personalization, incorrect content

What's NOT Considered Defective:

  • Minor color variations from digital preview (normal in printing)
  • AI artistic interpretation differences
  • Personal preference regarding art style
  • Minor imperfections in AI-generated illustrations
  • Slight paper texture variations
  • Normal wear from reading

Return Process:

  1. Contact support@kidbookcreator.com within 14 days with:
    • Order number
    • Clear photos showing the defect
    • Description of the issue
  2. We'll review and approve your return within 24-48 hours
  3. We provide a prepaid return shipping label (free for defects)
  4. Choose between full refund or replacement book
  5. Refund processed within 5-7 business days after we receive the return

Liability Limitation:

Our liability is limited to the purchase price of the book. We are not liable for indirect, consequential, or special damages.

Our Guarantee:

If your book is defective, we'll make it right with a full refund or free replacement‚Äîyour choice. Free return shipping for all defects. No questions asked.

faqs.question: How do you protect my personal data and photos?
faqs.answer:
We take your privacy and data security very seriously and comply with all major data protection regulations:

Data We Collect:

  • Personal Information: Name, email, shipping/billing address
  • Payment Data: Processed by third-party providers (Stripe) - we never store card details
  • Photos: Images uploaded for book creation only
  • Technical Data: IP address, browser type, device info (automatic)
  • Usage Data: Pages visited, clicks, session duration (analytics)

Photo Storage & Deletion:

  • Storage Duration: Photos stored for 30 days after order completion (shorter than industry standard of 90 days)
  • Automatic Deletion: Photos automatically and permanently deleted after 30 days
  • Early Deletion: Request immediate deletion by contacting support
  • Secure Storage: All photos encrypted (SSL/TLS) and stored on secure servers
  • AI Processing: Photos analyzed by AI solely for illustration generation
  • NOT used to train AI models
  • NOT shared with third parties (except AI provider under strict data processing agreement)

Legal Basis for Processing (GDPR):

  • Performance of Contract: Order processing, delivery, customer service
  • Legitimate Interest: Fraud prevention, security, site improvement
  • Consent: Marketing communications, non-essential cookies
  • Legal Obligation: Tax records (7 years), legal compliance

Data Protection Compliance:

  • GDPR Compliant: Full compliance with EU General Data Protection Regulation
  • CCPA Compliant: California Consumer Privacy Act compliance
  • COPPA Compliant: Children's Online Privacy Protection Act (US)
  • No Data Sales: We never sell or rent your personal data
  • Third-Party Processors: All bound by data processing agreements
  • International Transfers: Standard Contractual Clauses for non-EU transfers

Your Rights (GDPR/CCPA):

  • Right to Access: Request a copy of your personal data
  • Right to Rectification: Correct inaccurate data
  • Right to Erasure: Request deletion of your data (with legal exceptions)
  • Right to Restriction: Limit how we process your data
  • Right to Data Portability: Receive data in machine-readable format
  • Right to Object: Opt out of processing for marketing
  • Right to Withdraw Consent: Unsubscribe anytime
  • Right to Lodge Complaint: File complaint with supervisory authority

How to Exercise Your Rights:

Email privacy@kidbookcreator.com with your request. We'll respond within 30 days (GDPR) or 45 days (CCPA). Identity verification may be required.

Security Measures:

  • SSL/TLS encryption for all data transmission
  • Encrypted database storage
  • Access controls: Role-based employee access
  • Regular security audits and penetration testing
  • Data breach notification: Within 72 hours to authorities (GDPR)
  • PCI-DSS compliant payment processing

Cookies:

  • Essential cookies: Required for site functionality (no consent needed)
  • Analytics cookies: Google Analytics (consent required)
  • Marketing cookies: Advertising (consent required)
  • Manage cookie preferences via our cookie banner

Children's Privacy:

  • Service intended for adults (parents/guardians) to create books for children
  • We do not knowingly collect data from children under 16 (EU) or 13 (US)
  • If discovered, data deleted immediately
  • Parents can request deletion of child data

Data Retention:

  • Account data: While account active + reasonable period after closure
  • Order/invoice data: 7 years (tax/legal requirement)
  • Photos: 30 days, then automatic deletion
  • Marketing data: Until consent withdrawn

For complete details, please review our Privacy Policy, Terms & Conditions, and Cookie Policy.

sections.content: We process data when we have a legitimate interest, such as improving our Service, preventing fraud, ensuring security, and analyzing usage patterns.

sections.title: Consent
sections.content: We process data based on your explicit consent, such as for marketing communications, non-essential cookies, and newsletter subscriptions.

sections.title: Legal Obligation
sections.content: We process data to comply with legal requirements, such as tax record keeping (7 years) and responding to legal requests.

sections.title: Data Protection Safeguards
sections.content: All third parties sign Data Processing Agreements and are contractually bound to protect your data. We only share the minimum data necessary for each service.

sections.title: We Do Not Sell Your Data
sections.content: We never sell, rent, or trade your personal information to third parties for marketing purposes.

sections.title: Automatic Deletion
sections.content: We implement automatic deletion processes for photos and temporary data. You can also request early deletion of your data.

sections.title: How to Exercise Your Rights
sections.content: To exercise these rights, email us at privacy@kidbookcreator.com. We respond within 30 days (may extend to 90 days for complex requests). We may verify your identity before processing requests.

sections.title: Cookie Consent
sections.content: We ask for your consent before placing non-essential cookies. You can manage preferences through our cookie banner or browser settings.

sections.title: No Absolute Guarantee
sections.content: While we take reasonable measures to protect your data, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure. We will notify you of data breaches that pose a risk to your rights.

sections.title: Age Requirements
sections.content: You must be at least 16 years old (or 13 in the United States) to create an account. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under these ages.

sections.title: Parental Rights
sections.content: If you believe we have collected information from a child under the required age, please contact us immediately. We will delete the information promptly. Parents can request deletion of their child's data at any time.

sections.title: Children's Information
sections.content: We may collect information about children (names, photos) only when provided by their parents or legal guardians. This information is used solely for creating personalized books and is not used for other purposes.

sections.title: Photo Processing
sections.content: Photos you upload are analyzed by our systems to create character illustrations. Photos are used only for this purpose and not for training models or other purposes.

sections.title: Photo Retention
sections.content: Photos are stored for 90 days after order completion, then automatically deleted. You can request early deletion at any time.

sections.title: Service Provider Sharing
sections.content: Photos may be shared with content generation service providers under strict Data Processing Agreements. These providers are prohibited from using photos for any purpose other than generating your illustrations.

sections.title: Your Rights
sections.content: You confirm that you have the right to upload photos and have consent from all individuals depicted. For children's photos, you confirm you are their parent or legal guardian.

sections.title: Transfer Mechanisms
sections.content: When we transfer data outside the European Economic Area, we use appropriate safeguards such as Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs) approved by the European Commission. These ensure your data remains protected.

sections.title: Consent Required
sections.content: We only send promotional emails, newsletters, and marketing messages with your explicit consent. You can withdraw consent at any time.

sections.title: Opt-Out Options
sections.content: You can opt out of marketing communications by clicking the unsubscribe link in emails, updating your account preferences, or contacting us directly.

sections.title: Notification of Changes
sections.content: For significant changes, we will notify you by email or prominent website notice. Minor changes will be effective immediately upon posting. The 'Last updated' date indicates when this policy was last modified.

sections.title: Regular Review
sections.content: We review this policy regularly to ensure it remains accurate and compliant with applicable laws. We encourage you to review it periodically.

sections.title: Data Protection Authorities
sections.content: If you have concerns about how we handle your data, you also have the right to lodge a complaint with your local data protection authority.
